turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order some coffee at Peet's.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a medium iced white chocolate mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of milk would you like with your drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I go with soy milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to add whip cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add any sweeteners or syrups?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I think the whipped cream will be sweet enough.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And just to confirm, Is this for the location on 1st street?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Yes. Okay, I can make the first street.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, can you read that order back to me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I got a medium white Mocha with soy milk and whip cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, the white one! Yes, that is supposed to iced. I'm sorry.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So now I got a medium iced white Mocha with soy milk and whip cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, and I'll be picking that up on 1st Street in San Francisco.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me submit your order and verify the total.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your total will be $5.89 after tax.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, I will pick that up in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! It should be ready for pickup within 6-8 minutes.
